casebody.data:
BOGER
v.
MCGEE 158P06-10 Supreme Court of North Carolina. March 16, 2017

Derrick D. Boger, For Boger, Derrick D.

Mary Carla Babb, Assistant Attorney General, Roxann L. Vaneekhoven, District Attorney, For State of NC.

The following order has been entered on the motion filed on the 30th of January 2017 by Defendant for Tort Claim:

"Motion Dismissed by order of the Court in conference, this the 16th of March 2017."
